welcome.para1: This page demonstrates the cryptographic protocol Exposure Notification by Apple and Google used for decentralized app-based proximity tracing.

broadcastHistory.dayKeyPopover:
This key is a secret piece of information which is only used for the selected day to create rolling proximity IDs.

The temporary exposure key for the selected person on the selected day:

description.para1Addition: for Exposure Notification, these are 144 temporary exposure keys for the day of the key
